item.title: Roku Drives Up Revenue 15%, Turns in Surprise Profit in Solid Q2 Earnings Beat
item.description: Roku exceeded forecasts for the second quarter of 2025, with the streaming platform company turning in better-than-expected 15% top-line growth — and, in a surprise, a quarterly profit. On the s

item.title: Roku Snags Documentary on Philadelphia Eagles Super Bowl Win (Exclusive)
item.description: ‘Super Bowl Champions: The 2024 Philadelphia Eagles,’ is from NFL Films and Dan Silver’s BD4 Productions, and chronicles the team’s journey.
